name: VestaShield
0:
”alexa, arm my vesta.”
”alexa, arm my vesta in away mode.”
”alexa, disarm vesta.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The peace of mind you deserve – for your home or business.

With the Vesta skill for Alexa, you can now interact with your Vesta via voice commands. It’s as easy as saying “Alexa, arm my Vesta”. Simply enable the Vesta Skill on your Alexa app and link your Vesta accounts with alexa to get started.

To arm/disarm Vesta, say:

“Alexa, arm my Vesta”

“Alexa, arm my Vesta in away mode”

“Alexa, disarm my Vesta”

Note: In order to experience the ultimate convenience of a voice-controlled Vesta, you’ll need a registered Vesta account and a Vesta ecosystem installed in your home. 

Vesta is ViewQwest’s round-the-clock monitoring service to protect the people and things that matter the most to help you live life at home or manage your business better.

For more information about Vesta, please visit - www.viewqwest.com/smartliving/vesta
